proverbs: The path is clear for him who walks in truth.
As the dawn brings light, so Ogbe brings opportunity.
verses: Ogbe Ogbe says: When hope is planted, it grows into greatness.
Let the journey begin with pure intentions and wisdom.

proverbs: Light and shadow dance together in the palm of destiny.
The bridge between worlds is both seen and unseen.
verses: Ogbe Oyeku teaches: Balance the seen with the unseen, and all will be well.
He who knows both sides of the coin is truly wise.

proverbs: Out of darkness, wisdom is born.
When the seed splits, the sprout finds light.
verses: Ogbe Iwori speaks: In patience, the truth will reveal itself.
Let your search be guided by the ancestors’ light.

proverbs: A wall may slow the journey, but cannot end it.
Patience fills the calabash of fortune.
verses: Ogbe Odi warns: Where there is an obstacle, wisdom finds a way.
Do not force open the door that patience can unlock.

meaning: Reflection, experience, learning from the past
proverbs: He who ignores his shadow stumbles at noon.
Experience is the teacher no child can avoid.
verses: Ogbe Irosun says: Wisdom shines through remembered pain.
Turn and learn from the footprints behind you.

proverbs: In the whirlwind, opportunity hides.
Only the flexible branch survives the storm.
verses: Ogbe Owonrin advises: Be like water—adapt to every turn.
Let not surprise unsettle your root.

proverbs: A wise word can move mountains.
Speak so that your children will remember.
verses: Ogbe Obara says: Lead with compassion and listen more than you speak.
Let your words build, not break.

proverbs: A river bends but does not stop.
Challenge is the anvil upon which strength is forged.
verses: Ogbe Okanran teaches: Let hardship deepen your roots.
Walk with resolve, though the path be rough.

proverbs: Innovation is born where old ways fail.
Determination splits the hardest wood.
verses: Ogbe Ogunda guides: Ordinary actions make extraordinary results.
Persist where others hesitate.

proverbs: What the eyes see, the heart must judge.
Many waters flow beneath the surface.
verses: Ogbe Osa counsels: Beware of what is not spoken.
Trust your intuition when logic fails.

proverbs: Discipline is the key that unlocks the gate.
Strength is not just of the hand, but of the heart.
verses: Ogbe Ika says: What you control inside, nothing outside can shake.
Let self-mastery be your shield.

proverbs: After the dry season comes the rain.
Every ending is a beginning waiting to unfold.
verses: Ogbe Oturupón states: Embrace transformation as nature embraces the seasons.
Change arrives on the wings of renewal.

proverbs: Trust guides where eyes cannot see.
To be led is not to be lost.
verses: Ogbe Otura advises: Put your faith in the wisdom of your ancestors.
The spirit leads where feet cannot tread.

proverbs: Riches are measured not just in wealth, but in wisdom.
With abundance comes accountability.
verses: Ogbe Irete teaches: Prosperity grows where wise hands tend.
Share your fortune and multiply it.

proverbs: Water washes away what the hand cannot.
Healing is the root of new life.
verses: Ogbe Ose says: Let the old be washed away for the new to arise.
Healing begins when peace enters the heart.

proverbs: The clear path brings swift arrival.
He who sees far travels safely.
verses: Ogbe Ofun affirms: Fate is in your hands—walk boldly.
Destiny rewards the patient and the pure.
